description: React component for displaying a detailed course progress breakdown with expandable modules, status badges, progress bars, and icons.

methods.name: getStatusBadge
methods.description: Returns a badge component based on course status ('completed', 'in_progress', 'not_started').

methods.name: getProgressBarColor
methods.description: Determines progress bar color based on completion percentage.

methods.name: CourseBreakdown
methods.description: Main React component rendering course progress breakdown with expandable modules.
